metadata.name: Margaret Davis

persona.name: Kevin O'Brien
persona.role: Prospective customer, real estate broker (home office; uncertain if business-eligible)
persona.goal: Figure out whether to use residential portal or business service and get pointed to the right place
persona.context: Works from home, needs reliable internet for video tours; unsure whether to buy business-class or residential; starts with a vague inquiry
persona.tone: Casual, exploratory, not sure what to ask

intent.name: Change of Address / Move Service
intent.description: An existing customer needs to move service to a new business location; should be qualified and scheduled for a callback.
intent.goal: Capture new address and timeline and schedule a callback to coordinate the move.
intent.initialMessage: We’re moving offices next month—how do I transfer our service to the new address?

emotion.name: Skeptical
emotion.description: Challenges claims, asks for proof or confirmation, references past bad experiences, and questions pricing or reliability.

metadata.outcome: Agreed to schedule a Business Class callback to determine whether business or residential service is appropriate.

turns.content: We’re moving offices next month—how do I transfer our service to the new address?
I can set up a move appointment for you. What date, time, and timezone work best for the transfer?

messages: I can set up a move appointment for you. What date, time, and timezone work best for the transfer?

turns.content:
Before we book anything, can you help me figure out if I should even be on business service?  

I’m a real estate broker working out of my home—mostly video tours and calls—and I’ve been burned before by paying extra for “business” and getting the same thing as residential. How do I know which one I’m supposed to use with you, and does it actually make a difference in reliability or support?
Our Business Class agent can walk you through the differences and help you decide. Would you like me to schedule a call?

messages: Our Business Class agent can walk you through the differences and help you decide. Would you like me to schedule a call?

turns.content:
Maybe, but I don’t want to get thrown into a sales pitch if I’m really supposed to be on residential.  

Can you first tell me: if I’m running my brokerage from home, do you treat that as a business account or residential by default? And is there a separate residential support line/portal I should be using instead?
Our Business Class agent can explain the differences and which option fits your home‑based brokerage. Would you like me to set up a call?

messages: Our Business Class agent can explain the differences and which option fits your home‑based brokerage. Would you like me to set up a call?

turns.content:
Alright, let’s do the call, but I want it clear I’m just trying to figure out if I *should* be on business, not commit to anything.

They’ll still help me even if it turns out I’m better off on residential, right? And what times do they have tomorrow afternoon Eastern?
